types.html:
chimie inorganique f (uncountable)

  1. inorganic chemistry (chemistry of the elements (including carbon), and of compounds that do not contain carbon)
    Coordinate term: chimie organique
trans: inorganic chemistry , and of compounds that do not contain carbon)

title: chimie inorganique
pronunHtml: • IPA(key): /ʃi.mi i.nɔʁ.ɡa.nik/
